name: SoccerMotivation
0:
”Alexa, ask football motivation should I play football?”
”Alexa, ask football motivation when should I play?”
”Alexa, ask football motivation to motivate me.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: football motivation
des: This skill is meant to be used when a person is looking for some motivation to go out and play football. It will encourage you to play and also try to inspire you by quotes from famous football players. Don't just watch the football world cup 2018, also go out and play with your friends and score some goals!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
